### VALUE-ADD SUMMARY  
7821 Stewart Ave represented a strategic acquisition potential, currently listed with an additional 925 SF added compared to its original configuration. At a listing price of $3,849,000, the property showcases significant value enhancement, although further details on the purchase specifics, improvement costs, and total project duration are not available, limiting a precise evaluation of the spread achieved.
